QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Brentford on Sun, 26 Dec 2021 20:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 2–0 over Brentford on Sun, 26 Dec 2021 20:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Adam Lallana is the most accurate passer (95%) in the match.
Christian Nørgaard lost the most duels (13) in the match.
Neal Maupay has the least touches (38) of any outfield player.

Enock Mwepu was Player of the Match with a rating of 8.5.
